validationErrors.outsideRangeMax: Value should be less than or equal to {max}
validationErrors.outsideRangeMin: Value should be greater than or equal to {min}
validationErrors.invalidCodedValue: Value should be one of the listed values.
validationErrors.tooShort: This field requires a minimum of {min} characters
validationErrors.valuesIncompatible: Value is incompatible with other selected values
validationErrors.valuesDoNotMatch: Value does not match other selected values

noOriginKeyFeature: A feature cannot be added to '{relatedLayerName}' until the '{originKeyField}' has been entered.
noOriginKeyRecord: A record cannot be added to '{relatedLayerName}' until the '{originKeyField}' has been entered.
